API¶

The Test Case¶

class bbtest.testcases.BBTestCase(methodName='runTest')[source]¶

A black box test case based on unittest.TestCase

We’ve added a class property LAB that holds a dictionary defining the lab enviornment. Each test case can define a LAB property used to setup a lab and store it in self.lab.

address_book = {}¶
setUp()[source]¶

Hook method for setting up the test fixture before exercising it.

classmethod setUpClass()[source]¶

Setups a lab for black box testing.

classmethod tearDownClass()[source]¶

Hook method for deconstructing the class fixture after running all tests in the class.

The Black Box¶

To take part in a test a component needs to be wrapped in a BlackBox.

class bbtest.blackboxes.BlackBox(host, name=None)[source]¶

This is an abstract class used to wrap a component in a black box. Black boxes can then be used to test the component itself and to verify it integrates well with other components. A blackbox runs on a host and you can communicate with it using host.run

install()[source]¶

Installing the black box on self.host

mkdtemp(**kwagrs)[source]¶

Create a temp directory

uninstall()[source]¶

Removing the black box from self.host
